title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Horror***
Zombieworld (2015) http://180upload.com/rzu98t38pvqr http://www.thenerfherderblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/zombieworld-e1424238494190.jpg http://i.imgur.com/vE88Jpt.jpg There is nowhere to hide...nowhere to run...the Zombie Apocalypse has come, and our world now belongs to the dead! From Ireland, Canada, Australia, Europe and all over the U.S., the bone-chilling news reports tell the same gruesome tale - walking corpses terrorize and devour the living. Only a few desperate humans find the courage to stand and fight for their last chance at survival. But the hordes of undead keep coming, and there's only one thing on the menu - us.
VANish (2015) http://180upload.com/49n5ygjwse6a http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Nzc0MzMwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NjEwNDE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://megashara.org/uploads/posts/2015-02/1423331161_923258ae2859b2d8a72ab26521a38e50.jpg A kidnapped young woman is forced on a road trip full of murder and mayhem that takes place entirely in her captor's getaway van.
Hansel Vs Gretel (2015) http://vodlocker.com/yi3j4td84otv http://www.filminkeyfi.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/hazel-vs-gratel.jpg http://www.dvd-forum.at/img/uploaded/hansel-vs-gretel-the-asylum-news-2.jpg When Gretel falls under a dark spell and organizes a coven of witches, Hansel must find the courage to fight his twin sister and the sinister forces controlling her.
Ouija (2014) http://180upload.com/wolav1mesp7a http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ1NzcwMTU5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTE5MzEyMjE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://o.aolcdn.com/hss/storage/midas/ce538600470ce76f42683127d1ceb222/200638840/ouija+trailer.jpg Zoe, Nan and Queenie use a Ouija board, while using it they discover they are talking to ''The Axeman''
Deliver Us from Evil (2014) http://vidplay.net/sb3w7jwffqg0 http://i.imgur.com/RYnGulv.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/o0ampDPiwQ8/maxresdefault.jpg New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.
The Conjuring (2014) http://180upload.com/6ji1z2yn5b59 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjA1NDMyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQzNDMzOQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.djmullet.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/the-conjuring-movie-2013-desktop-hd-wallpaper.jpg Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
Jessabelle (2014) http://180upload.com/c179xr9fsen8 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTM1MjYzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQwMjA1MjE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.matchdrama.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Jessabelle-2014-Watch-Online-Free-Movie-Trailer-01.jpg Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, Jessabelle comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return -- and has no intention of letting her escape.
7500 (2014) http://vidplay.net/g3tlhhj7gine http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTYxMTA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU5ODQzNw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? https://mz-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/photo/file/157172/20cd293e9499530c1b186876e7f8dd40-7500_39.jpg Flight 7500 departs Los Angeles International Airport bound for Tokyo. As the overnight flight makes its way over the Pacific Ocean during its ten-hour course, the passengers encounter what appears to be a supernatural force in the cabin.
Extraterrestrial (2014) http://vidplay.net/09j5n38x3qvs http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MjUwNzQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk2NTY3MjE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://img.olvies.com/uploads/2014/10/642-extraterrestrial1280x795-watch-trailer-for-sci-fi-horror-extraterrestrial-has-landed.jpeg A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.
Evil Dead (2013) http://180upload.com/17ksv8819vn6 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BNTQ3OTkwNTgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTAzOTAzOQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.blastr.com/sites/blastr/files/Evil_Dead1.jpg Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival.
Carrie (2013) http://180upload.com/iptmohiamipa http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1MDIyOTkxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU1NzEzMDE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.thatfilmguy.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Carrie-Poster1.jpg A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.
April Apocalypse (2013) http://180upload.com/57pet55k16rb http://www.hkmania.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/April-Apocalypse.jpg http://cdn2-www.shocktillyoudrop.com/assets/uploads/2013/10/file_176857_3_april-apocalypse3.jpg After years of yearning for the girl next door, Artie finally builds the courage to woo her... only to find out the girl of his dreams and best friend, April, is moving away - sending Artie into a deep depression. Three years later, the emptiness subsides and the lion inside tells Artie to "go find April and make her yours". Empowered and eager to find April, Artie crashes his car on the way... and wakes up a week later in the middle of a zombie outbreak. Now it's up to Artie and his ever-growing courage to find April - no matter what cannibalistic creature steps in his way. </item
I Spit on Your Grave 2 (2013) http://180upload.com/od9pk7p0pn55 http://img.rlsbb.com/images/2013/09/06/B00DMUFYZQ.jpg https://thehorrorbooth.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/i-spit-on-your-grave-2010-2.jpg When Katie innocently accepts an offer to have new photos taken for her portfolio, the experience quickly turns into a nightmare of rape, torture and kidnapping. Now, she will have to find the strength to exact her brutal revenge.
The Purge (2013) http://thefile.me/gz09d1zo33pb http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0OTE1Nzk2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjE5NDY0OQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? https://zuts.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/the-purge-being-marched-upon.jpg In the future, a wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.
Hansel & Gretel (2013) http://movreel.com/g6hvr2w6qml7 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjI3MDQ4ODU5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTcxNDQ5OA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://cdn.bloody-disgusting.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/5-Hansel-and-Gretel-Witch-Hunters.jpg In this modern retelling of the classic horror tale, teen siblings are enslaved by a psychotic recluse within her gruesome house of horrors in the woods.
Mama (2013) http://movreel.com/w6qg66amuanc http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5MjIwNDAwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQyOTY0OA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-giLpJz9KbZE/UPoJyTL693I/AAAAAAAAB8M/sABxVKq_oGE/s640/screen-shot-2013-01-16-at-4-38-05-am.png Annabel and Lucas are faced with the challenge of raising his young nieces that were left alone in the forest for 5 years.... but how alone were they?
sxtape (2013) http://180upload.com/dfqoon9bqqjr http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BNDU4MDE3MTE4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE3MTA2MTE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://img.rlsbb.com/images/2014/05/17/Caitlyn-Folley-SX-Tape.jpg Jill's an artist. Ian's a filmmaker. And their love life is off the chain. There's no experience too wild, no dare too dangerous -- not even when Jill lets Ian strap her to a gurney in the abandoned hospital they're scoping out for their next art show. But he shouldn't have left her alone. Not even as a joke. Now, Jill's hookup with horror has awakened something in that place. Something with a lust for more than flesh.
Zombie Apocalypse (2011) http://vidplay.net/c9zc1xuf4jqw http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MTEzNjgxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQyNTA5Ng@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0MTQ2MzAzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDAyMDc5Ng@@._V1_.jpg Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina. </item
The Human Centipede II (2011) http://180upload.com/hcsg35ahljoh http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjkwMDI0NjA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAxODI4Ng@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://horrorcultfilms.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/human-centipede-2-slide.jpg Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.
Red Riding Hood (2011) http://180upload.com/8ezxlbpdq1uq http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NjYyMzQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE5Mjc3NA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://moviestorrents.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Red-Riding-Hood-2011.jpg Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.
The Darkest Hour (2011) http://movreel.com/xaaibk3yzz3k http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTIxNTY3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY2MDMwNw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.aceshowbiz.com/images/still/the-darkest-hour04.jpg In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.
The Rite (2011) http://thefile.me/ft031rygicxd http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxNTAxMTMzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ1MDAxNA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://i.ytimg.com/vi/FhHnP-9iekg/hqdefault.jpg An American seminary student travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.
And Soon the Darkness (2010) http://180upload.com/lic6v0vzhv5r http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1MDk2NjU5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQ2MDAwNA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? https://kultguyskeep.files.wordpress.com/2014/06/and-soon-the-darkness-1.jpg When two American girls on a bike trip in a remote part of Argentina split up and one of them goes missing, the other must find her before her worst fears are realized.
The Troll Hunter (2010) http://180upload.com/1szzr99nksqt http://www.elseptimoarte.net/carteles/troll_hunter_12544.jpg http://www.lifeafterundeath.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Trollhunter2010Image1.jpg A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.
Children of the Corn (2009) http://movreel.com/2psthwqil38d http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwOTkxNTEzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQ0Mzg4Mg@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.childstarlets.com/captures/videocaps/anikolas/childrenofcorn/ancorn37.jpg While traveling, an unhappy married couple encounter a cult of murderous children who worship an entity called He Who Walks Behind the Rows.
1408 (2007) http://180upload.com/hcywxgb5r3fl http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwOTUxMzA2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDAwMDU1MQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.hellblast.hu/images/posts/2013-07-11-1408.jpg A man who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.
